ygData.subject: Will sappers and camo
ygData.msgSnippet: Let me throw in this then as some of you know I play a druid mainly and I forget that I am talking to the bard list as i subscribe to a few list...and yes
ygData.messageBody:
Let me throw in this then as some of you know I play a druid mainly and
I forget that I am talking to the bard list as i subscribe to a few
list...and yes definately camo is different than bards song. I
apologize...i usually like to open my mouth and talk when it concerns
something I know a little somthing about....some day I will be cured of
this.... anyway...i can say they definately see through camo...
I am not saying that everything that comes out of the castle can see
you...but trust me when I tell you that I have been standing camo'd and
watching all the mobs in the huge train run by me...right next to the
lake and I will be the only one standing there and the will sapper will
change the path from running towards the zone and purposely run out of
its way to come over and beat on me while all the others have
completely ignored me. I have never had anything else see me camo'd
except the will sapper. this has also happened to me more than
once....i dunno maybe its just me or maybe its the difference between
camo and the invisiblity song......but they have always seen through
camo....

Crysarra the big mouth druid who likes to throw in her 2 cents
with a baby bard
